Statute.Title: Restoring Rail Service Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Reprise des services ferroviaires, Loi sur la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2012, c. 8 (assent: 31.05.2012, 6:16 p.m.) Act comes into force on the expiry of twenty-fourth hour after the time at which it is assented to, in force 01.06.2012 see s. 18
